testSteps.description: Given a user is on the hotel booker platform
And the user is successfully logged in

When the following hotel details are entered and created:
| Name | Novotel |
| Address | 23 Penrith Close, Bromley BR4 5YT |
| Owner | Novotel Group |
| Tel | 0207665432 |
| Email | novotel@novotel.com |

Then the page is updated with the following
| Novotel |
| 23 Penrith Close, Bromley BR4 5YT |
| Novotel Group |
| 0207665432 |
| novotel@novotel.com |

userStory.storyName: This feature simulates the creation of a new hotel entry

featureTag.name: This feature simulates the creation of a new hotel entry
